data_description.primary_agent: The first conversation agent that all requests will go to. Recommended to be the fastest and local-only agent you have, even if it isn't very good at responding.
data_description.fallback_agent: The backup conversation agent incase the primary agent is unable to handle the request. This is where you may use an cloud service or a very slow conversation agent.
data_description.use_fallback_response:
Even if the primary agent responds, use the fallback agent's response instead. 
Usually this response is more interesting, e.g. if using Home Assistant as the primary agent, it will respond simply with "command received".
